Title: Relates to rainwater harvesting
Summary: Provides for requirements for rainwater harvesting designed to temporarily store stormwater runoff for detention or re-use through retention; may assist in meeting stormwater runoff reduction goals.
LawCode: Add Art 15 Title 35 §§15-3501 - 15-3513, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to rainwater harvesting
